item.title: From Ice Shows to Algorithms: Cracking the Truck-Packing Puzzle
item.description:
Early in my programming career, I came across a logistics problem that fascinated me and never quite let go:

“Given a truck and a list of boxes, in what order and orientation should you pack them?”

At the time, I didn’t have the skills or computational resources to tackle it properly. It sat in the same bucket of “hard” problems as traveling salesman or knapsack. But years later, with Python, better tools, and generative AI at hand, I can finally experiment with solving this 3D bin-packing puzzle.
